description: A protocol for standardized interaction with external agent APIs.

rules.description: A central registry of all approved external agent APIs MUST be maintained at 'knowledge_core/external_api_registry.json'.
rules.enforcement: The agent's core logic MUST consult this registry before making any calls to an external agent API.

rules.description: API keys for external services MUST be managed securely via environment variables.
rules.enforcement: The agent's external API client will be designed to read API keys from environment variables.

rules.description: A standardized client for interacting with external agent APIs MUST be implemented in 'tooling/external_api_client.py'.
rules.enforcement: All interactions with external agent APIs MUST be routed through this standardized client.
